member.name: WS_XML_READER_BUFFER_INPUT
member.summary: Specifies that the source of the xml input is a buffer.

member.name: WS_XML_READER_BUFFER_INPUT.input
member.summary: The base type for all types that derive from .

member.name: WS_XML_READER_BUFFER_INPUT.encodedData
member.summary: A pointer to the bytes of data that comprise the encoded form of the xml. The reader will not modify any of these bytes.
